meanings.definition: The act of signing a document or contract.
meanings.sent1: The signings on the contract were done quickly.
meanings.sent2: She collected all the signings for the new project.
meanings.sent3: The signings on the agreement made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His signings on the paper were like a stamp of approval.
meanings.sent5: The signings on the document were as clear as day.

meanings.definition: A person or group of people who have signed a document or contract.
meanings.sent1: The signings were all present at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The new signings in the company brought fresh ideas.
meanings.sent3: The signings were all in a celebratory mood after the contract.
meanings.sent4: She welcomed the signings with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The signings were like a united front in the negotiation.
